alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lauderdale, southeastern Colbert and northwestern Lawrence Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Town Creek, or 11 miles east of Muscle Shoals, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Rogersville, Killen, Town Creek, Lexington, Leighton and Courtland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Alabama.
